text: Swashta BharatSwastha Bharat/Swasth Bharat is a health magazine programme launched on World Health Day by Ghulam Nabi Azad, Union Health & Family Welfare Minister. Doordarshan and All India Radio telecast / broadcast "Swastha Bharat" through 30 regional kendras.DDK: DELHI/LPTs DETAILS OF SPONSORED PROGRAMME It was launched on 07 April, 2012.MoHFW launches “Swastha Bharat” series on World Health Day == References == Category:Government_programmes_of_India
title: Swasth Bharat
